snippet: Mark Buehrle held Kansas City to six hits in eight scoreless innings and won his sixth straight decision, his longest streak in nine years.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Toronto Blue Jays beat Kansas City Royals, 4-0; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Mark Buehrle held Kansas City to six hits in eight scoreless innings and won his sixth straight decision, his longest streak in nine years.

headline.main: Buehrle Rolls to 10th Victory as Blue Jays Expand Lead
headline.print_headline: Buehrle Rolls to 10th Victory as Blue Jays Expand Lead
